scripts.setup: pnpm install && [ ! -L .env ] && ln -sf "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/.env" .env || true && [ ! -L apps/web/.env ] && ln -sf "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/apps/web/.env" apps/web/.env || true && [ ! -L apps/backend/.env ] && ln -sf "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/apps/backend/.env" apps/backend/.env || true && [ ! -L apps/ai/.env ] && ln -sf "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/apps/ai/.env" apps/ai/.env || true && pnpm infra:bootstrap && pnpm bootstrap
scripts.run: CONDUCTOR_WEB_PORT=$CONDUCTOR_PORT CONDUCTOR_BE_PORT=$((CONDUCTOR_PORT+1)) CONDUCTOR_AI_PORT=$((CONDUCTOR_PORT+2)) pnpm run conductor:run
